file_content.text: I doubt we'll be hearing from the Brig Stompers anytime soon.
Don't hold back on the Brig Stompers.
You armed? If not, I suggest you head to Requisitions immediately.
Hoth must be a magnet for the galaxy's scum.
Our scouts just spotted enemy hostiles massing in a nearby ice field. Head count puts them at a two-to-one advantage.
What's a Brig Stomper?
The Brig Stompers are alien mercenaries, ex-military. Gained notoriety when they wiped out Gaftikar's entire planetary defense force during a coup.
We knew they were operating out of Hoth. Just didn't realize they were fixing to turn this outpost into their new headquarters.
Got to love mercs.
They're organized, disciplined and outfitted with state-of-the-art weaponry.
If it's a fight you're spoiling for, look no further.
However, they're also vulnerable. Doubt they'd expect an attack. We can strike now and stop this invasion before it starts.
I'll attack the Brig Stompers.
I have nothing but contempt for any soldier who'd discard loyalty and patriotism for a few credits.
These aren't your typical pirate trash, either. These are Brig Stompers.
Wipe them out.
With our forces divided between the Hailstorm Brotherhood and the Republic, the Brig Stompers couldn't have picked a worse time to strike.
You're scared of them.
Call it caution. The Brig Stompers have a reputation for being the most professional, stone cold mercs in the trade.
The Brig Stompers have a history. Wouldn't be the first military installation they've overrun.
They'll never take this base.
Not a chance. [Refuse quest]
Then if you'll excuse me, I need to prepare our defenses.
Good thing I'm here.
If there was another paramilitary group as good as the Brig Stompers, I'd be hiring them right now.
We don't know they're hostile.
What will that involve?
Our scouts have spotted several storage caches where the Brig Stompers keep their weapons, ammunition and medical supplies.
Destroying the supply caches and thinning the Brig Stompers' numbers ought to put a dent in their plans. Gives us a fighting chance, at least.
Our scouts witnessed the carnage. Said you did quite a number on those Brig Stompers.
We're still tallying the damage, but it looks like you officially wrecked their operation. They'd be crazy to attack us now.
Think we'll be in the clear. Thank you.
I'm not scared of anyone.
I hope this is worth my time.
I assure you, the threat is real.
